resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request, #13876:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13876

   The current configuration is inverted.
   *-glib-libs have .gir and *-glib-devel have .typelib.

   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 6e8f0e4d327180375dda53287a5a600ba139ce3d and contender = b3a29f5f65ce49cc71a4fc69c186d495476e9748. b3a29f5f65ce49cc71a4fc69c186d495476e9748 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.

fields.description:
The current configuration is inverted.
*-glib-libs have .gir and *-glib-devel have .typelib.
